chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.para: The Geomajas SLD Editor Project is a stand-alone project under the Geomajas banner.

It's goal is to provide a code for handling and manipulating SLD data and files. The initial version of the SLD editor provides a textual editor and in-memory backend service that supports the following use cases:

listitem.para: load an SLD file from a populated template list.
show syntax colored xml content in the editor.
edit xml content of the SLD file.
save xml content of the SLD file.
